subject: Prudential Center (Newark)
Hockey, Ice
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The new Prudential Center allows Devils fans to mingle with interloping Rangers fans and Islanders fans in the streets but also in the spacious corridors and food courts of the arena.
snippet: The new Prudential Center allows Devils fans to mingle with interloping Rangers fans and Islanders fans in the streets but also in the spacious corridors and food courts of the arena.
